verses.plain: But I determined this with myself, that I would not come again to you in heaviness.

tokens.t: But I determined this with myself, that I would not come again to you in heaviness.

verses.plain: For if I make you sorry, who is he then that maketh me glad, but the same which is made sorry by me?

tokens.t: For if I make you sorry, who is he then that maketh me glad, but the same which is made sorry by me?

verses.plain: And I wrote this same unto you, lest, when I came, I should have sorrow from them of whom I ought to rejoice; having confidence in you all, that my joy is the joy of you all.

tokens.t: And I wrote this same unto you, lest, when I came, I should have sorrow from them of whom I ought to rejoice; having confidence in you all, that my joy is
of you all.

verses.plain: For out of much affliction and anguish of heart I wrote unto you with many tears; not that ye should be grieved, but that ye might know the love which I have more abundantly unto you.

tokens.t: For out of much affliction and anguish of heart I wrote unto you with many tears; not that ye should be grieved, but that ye might know the love which I have more abundantly unto you.

verses.plain: But if any have caused grief, he hath not grieved me, but in part: that I may not overcharge you all.

tokens.t: But if any have caused grief, he hath not grieved me, but in part: that I may not overcharge you all.

verses.plain: Sufficient to such a man is this punishment, which was inflicted of many.

tokens.t: Sufficient to such a man
this punishment, which
of many.

verses.plain: So that contrariwise ye ought rather to forgive him, and comfort him, lest perhaps such a one should be swallowed up with overmuch sorrow.

tokens.t: So that contrariwise ye
rather to forgive
, and comfort
, lest perhaps such a one should be swallowed up with overmuch sorrow.

verses.plain: Wherefore I beseech you that ye would confirm your love toward him.

tokens.t: Wherefore I beseech you that ye would confirm
love toward him.

verses.plain: For to this end also did I write, that I might know the proof of you, whether ye be obedient in all things.

tokens.t: For to this end also did I write, that I might know the proof of you, whether ye be obedient in all things.

verses.plain: To whom ye forgive any thing, I forgive also: for if I forgave any thing, to whom I forgave it, for your sakes forgave I it in the person of Christ;

tokens.t: To whom ye forgive any thing, I
also: for if I forgave any thing, to whom I forgave
, for your sakes
in the person of Christ;

verses.plain: Lest Satan should get an advantage of us: for we are not ignorant of his devices.

tokens.t: Lest Satan should get an advantage of us: for we are not ignorant of his devices.

verses.plain: Furthermore, when I came to Troas to preach Christ’s gospel, and a door was opened unto me of the Lord,

tokens.t: Furthermore, when I came to Troas to
Christ’s gospel, and a door was opened unto me of the Lord,

verses.plain: I had no rest in my spirit, because I found not Titus my brother: but taking my leave of them, I went from thence into Macedonia.

tokens.t: I had no rest in my spirit, because I found not Titus my brother: but taking my leave of them, I went from thence into Macedonia.

verses.plain: Now thanks be unto God, which always causeth us to triumph in Christ, and maketh manifest the savour of his knowledge by us in every place.

tokens.t: Now thanks
unto God, which always causeth us to triumph in Christ, and maketh manifest the savour of his knowledge by us in every place.

verses.plain: For we are unto God a sweet savour of Christ, in them that are saved, and in them that perish:

tokens.t: For we are unto God a sweet savour of Christ, in them that are saved, and in them that perish:

verses.plain: To the one we are the savour of death unto death; and to the other the savour of life unto life. And who is sufficient for these things?

tokens.t: To the one
the savour of death unto death; and to the other the savour of life unto life. And who
sufficient for these things?

verses.plain: For we are not as many, which corrupt the word of God: but as of sincerity, but as of God, in the sight of God speak we in Christ.

tokens.t: For we are not as many, which corrupt the word of God: but as of sincerity, but as of God, in the sight of God speak we in Christ.
